name: Echo Bop!
description:
You can play as of 2 little aliens with the power to shoot waves of echo. You must fly around the level and destroy the opponent. But watch out as the eye of the galaxy will be in your way and make sure to avoid it or else you'll be destroyed.

Music:  Silver Surfer-Level 1 Theme NES https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-J0H5ah1G7A

Music created by Tim & Geoff Follin.
